Text.Language: Marener'alin: nem pihumnodoc: Dauid pip~rov/t/c: piiero'alt/c.
Let us sing, with the hymnist, David the prophet and the good psalmist.
فلنرتل مع المرتل داود النبي. الحسن في الترتيل.
Ntenws e~bol: qen ouq~rwou n~ouwt: je ouwnh e~bol m~P%: je oua~gayoc pe.
Let us proclaim, in one voice saying, Give thanks to the Lord, for He is good.
ونصرخ بصوت واحد قائلين اشكروا الرب فانه صالح.
Ouwnh e~bol m~V]: P%# n~te ni%: je pefnai sop sa e~neh: nem sa nie~neh t/rou.
Give thanks to God, the Lord of Lords, for His mercy endures forever, and unto the end of the ages.
اشكروا الله رب الارباب. لان رحمته دائمه الى الابد. والى كل الدهور.
Je afi~ri n~hans~v/ri: m~paradoxon: afyamio~ n~niv/oui~: qen pefka] etswm.
For He has performed miraculous wonders, He created the heavens with His high understanding.
لأنه صنع عجائب. وخلق السموات بفهمه الرفيع.
Hannis] n~refe~rouwini: pir/ nem piioh: af,au eue~rouwini: cap~swi n~niv/oui~.
The two great lights, the sun and the moon, He has made to enlighten, above the heavens.
النيرين العظيمين الشمس والقمر. جعلهما ينيران فوق السموات.
Vr/ n~ouersisi: n~te pie~hoou: piioh nem niciou: n~ouersisi n~te piejwrh.
The sun to rule, by day, the moon and stars, to rule by night.
الشمس لسلطان النهار. والقمر والنجوم لسلطان الليل.
Afsari n~niremn~,/mi: nem nousamici t/rou: ouoh auwmc m~mwou: qen v~iom n~sari.
He struck the Egyptians, and all their firstborn. And He drowned them in the Red Sea.
وضرَبَ المصريين وكل ابكارهم وغرَّقهم في البحر الاحمر.
Qen oujij eca~mahi: nem ouswbs ef[oci: afi~ni m~Pic#l# e~bol: qen toum/].
With a strong hand and with an outstretched arm, he brought Israel out of their midst.
بيد عزيزةِ. وذراع رفيع. اخرج اسرائيل من وسطهم.
Varaw~ p~ouro: nem nefnis] n~harma: aferpontizin m~mwou: qen viom n~sari.
He drowned, Pharaoh the king, and his great chariots, in the Red Sea.
فرعون الملك. ومراكبه العظيمة غرَّقهم في البحر الاحمر.
Afqwteb de on: n~hannis] n~ourwou: euoi n~s~v/ri: m~polemit/c.
And He also killed great kings; they became a miracle for the warriors.
وقَتَل ايضاً ملوكاً عظماء صارُوا معجزة المحاربين.
Ete C/wn p~ouro: n~te nia~morreoc: nem Wg p~ouro: n~te y~baki m~Bacan.
And they are Sihon of the Amorites and Og the king of Bashan.
وهم شيحون ملك الاموريين. وعوج ملك باشان.
Afmenre pilaoc: n~te Pic#l#: aft/itou nwou m~poukahi: euk~l/ronomia~.
He gave their lands as a heritage to the people of Israel whom He loved.
وأحبَّ شعب اسرائيل. وأعطاهم أرضهم ميراثاً.
Ete a~non pe: qa ni,~rictia~noc: afmou] e~ron: je n/e~tenouf.
We the Christians, are as they. He called us His beloved.
اللذين نحن معشر المسيحيين. ودعانا خواصه.
Ouoh aferpenmeui~: qen penyebio~: ouoh afcotten e~bol: qen nenjaji t/rou.
And He remembered us in our lowly state. He saved us from the hands of our enemies.
وذكرنا في تواضعنا. وخلَّصنا من اعدائنا.
Eybe vai tenws: e~bol enjw m~moc: nem pihumnodoc: Dauid pip~rov/t/c.
Therefore we proclaim, and say, with the hymnist, David the prophet.
فلذلك نصرخ ونقول مع المرتل داود النبي.
Je ouwnh e~bol m~P%: n~te ni% t/rou: je oua~gayoc pe: je pefnai sop sa e~neh.
Give thanks to the Lord of all lords, for He is good, and His mercy endures forever.
اشكروا رب الارباب. فانه صالح والى الابد رحمته.
Hiten nieu,/: n~te piiero'alt/c Dauid pip~rov/t/c: P% a~rih~mot nan: m~p~,w e~bol n~te nennobi.
Through the prayers of David the psalmist, O Lord grant us the forgiveness of our sins.
بصلوات داود المرتل. يارب انعم لنا بغفران خطايانا.
